description.name: Store.icu Ecommerce Sitebuilder
description.tagline: Integrate WHMCS with Store.icu ecommerce sitebuilder for web hosting companies.
description.long: This module integrates with the Store.icu ecommerce sitebuilder API, allowing web hosting companies to offer store-building services to their clients with fully automated provisioning and management.
features: Automated account provisioning and store creation
Single sign-on to store admin panel
Admin interface for viewing client's stores
